James Marcus (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Marcus_(American_actor) 0 James A. Marcus (January 21, 1867 – October 15, 1937) was an American actor. He appeared in 109 films between 1915 and 1937. He was born in New York City and died in Hollywood, California from a heart attack. Marcus' most notable films include Regeneration, Oliver Twist and Sadie Thompson. James_A._Marcus ( January_21_,_1867 – October_15_,_1937 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in 109_films between 1915_and_1937 . He was_born in New_York_City and died in Hollywood , California from a_heart_attack . Marcus '_most_notable_films include Regeneration , Oliver_Twist and Sadie_Thompson .
